caption: The scene starts in a town and then enters a warehouse where an elderly man is sleeping in bed. In the morning, he is by the seaside, engaging in activities and riding a motorcycle. The old man wakes up from bed, pushes the motorcycle out of the warehouse, and tries to start it. His neighbor from the second floor of a house appears, speaks a few words to him, and then closes the window. During the day, a young boy and the old man are in a room. The old man is operating some tools, and the boy is pouring water. The boy runs back to his home and enters the kitchen. He sneakily takes a tool while his mother is busy making a phone call.
